Motivation: My name is Celaena Sardothien," she whispered, "and I will not be afraid.”
Author: Sarah J. Maas, The Assassin's Blade

Motivation: Loneliness and the feeling of being unwanted is the most terrible poverty.”
Author: Mother Teresa

Motivation: Let us live so that when we come to die even the undertaker will be sorry.”
Author: Mark Twain

Motivation: “The universe is big, its vast and complicated, and ridiculous. And sometimes, very rarely, impossible things just happen and we call them miracles. And that's the theory. Nine hundred years, never seen one yet, but this would do me.”
Author: Steven Moffat

Motivation: There is no more profitable investment than investing in yourself. It is the best investment you can make; you can never go wrong with it. It is the true way to improve yourself to be the best version of you and lets you be able to best serve those around you.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

Motivation: The future was one thing that could never be broken, because it had not yet had the chance to be anything.”
Author: Sarah Dessen, Saint Anything

Motivation: Watch for the thing that will show itself to you. Because that thing, when you find it, will be your future.”
Author: Arthur Golden, Memoirs of a Geisha

Motivation: We do not remember days, we remember moments.”
Author: Cesare Pavese

Motivation: At the moment of commitment the entire universe conspires to assist you.”
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Motivation: Don't bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself.”
Author: William Faulkner

Motivation: Sometimes it comes down to a choice," Magnus said. "Between saving one person and saving the whole world. I've seen it happen, and I'm selfish enough to want the person who loves me to choose me. But Nephilim wil always choose the world. I look at Alec and I feel like Lucifer in Paradise Lost. 'Abashed the Devil stood, And felt how awful goodness is.' He meant it in the classical sense. 'Awful' as in inspiring awe. And awe is well and good, but it's poison to love. Love has to be between equals.""He's just a boy," said Luke. "Alec--he's not perfect. And you're not fallen." "We're all fallen," said Magnus, and he wrapped himself up in his chains and was silent.”
Author: Cassandra Clare, City of Heavenly Fire

Motivation: It is our wounds that create in us a desire to reach for miracles. The fulfillment of such miracles depends on whether we let our wounds pull us down or lift us up towards our dreams.”
Author: Jocelyn Soriano, Mend My Broken Heart

Motivation: Don't let anyone take care of you. Can you maybe leave that for me to do? I mean, take care of you? Feel free to take care of me in return... because I think I'll need you to do that.”
Author: Melina Marchetta, The Piper's Son

Motivation: “The tears of the world are a constant quantity. For each one who begins to weep somewhere else another stops. The same is true of the laugh.”
Author: Samuel Beckett, Waiting for Godot

Motivation: A child may not know how to feed itself, or what to eat, yet it knows hunger.”
Author: Daniel Keyes, Flowers for Algernon

Motivation: “Status quo, you know, is Latin for 'the mess we're in'.”
Author: Ronald Reagan

Motivation: “When people don't express themselves, they die one piece at a time.”
Author: Laurie Halse Anderson, Speak

Motivation: Go out in the woods, go out. If you don't go out in the woods nothing will ever happen and your life will never begin.”
Author: Clarissa Pinkola Estés, Women Who Run With the Wolves: Myths and Stories of the Wild Woman Archetype

Motivation: There was another life that I might have had, but I am having this one.”
Author: Kazuo Ishiguro

Motivation: Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life's coming attractions.”
Author: Albert Einstein

Motivation: We are all worms, But I do believe that I am a glow worm.”
Author: Winston S. Churchill, Never Give In!: The Best of Winston Churchill's Speeches

Motivation: Realize deeply that the present moment is all you will ever have.”
Author: Eckhart Tolle

Motivation: It is books that are a key to the wide world; if you can't do anything else, read all that you can.”
Author: Jane Hamilton

Motivation: There is great change to be experienced once you learn the power of letting go. Stop allowing anyone or anything to control, limit, repress, or discourage you from being your true self! Today is YOURS to shape - own it - break free from people and things that poison or dilute your spirit.”
Author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

Motivation: Music is the literature of the heart; it commences where speech ends.”
Author: Alphonse de Lamartine

Motivation: Atticus, he was real nice.""Most people are, Scout, when you finally see them.”
Author: Harper Lee, To Kill a Mockingbird

Motivation: Changing your outside world cannot make you happy if you are an unhappy person. The real personal change can only happen from the inside out. If you firstly create the change within yourself, you can turn your life around.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

Motivation: A thing worth having is a thing worth cheating for.”
Author: W.C. Fields

Motivation: “younot wanting mewasthe beginning of mewanting myselfthank you”
Author: Nayyirah Waheed

Motivation: You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Motivation: She had become accustomed to being lonely. She was used to walking alone and to being considered 'different.' She did not suffer too much.”
Author: Betty Smith, A Tree Grows in Brooklyn

Motivation: So early in my life, I had learned that if you want something, you had better make some noise.
Author: Malcolm X, The Autobiography Of Malcolm X

Motivation: “To love and win is the best thing.To love and lose, the next best.”
Author: William Makepeace Thackeray

Motivation: Step follows step,Hope follows Courage,Set your face towards danger,Set your heart on victory.”
Author: Gail Carson Levine, The Two Princesses of Bamarre

Motivation: A graceful refusal is better than a lengthy promise.”
Author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

Motivation: Great heroes need great sorrows and burdens, or half their greatness goes unnoticed. It is all part of the fairy tale.”
Author: Peter S. Beagle, The Last Unicorn

Motivation: Only after disaster can we be resurrected. It's only after you've lost everything that you're free to do anything. Nothing is static, everything is evolving, everything is falling apart.”
Author: Chuck Palahniuk, Fight Club

Motivation: I kept always two books in my pocket, one to read, one to write in.”
Author: Robert Louis Stevenson, Essays of Robert Louis Stevenson

Motivation: “If you dont have any shadows you're not in the light”
Author: Lady Gaga

Motivation: “Until you step into the unknown, you don’t know what you’re made of.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Motivation: “A smart person knows how to talk. A wise person knows when to be silent.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Motivation: “How much time he gains who does not look to see what his neighbour says or does or thinks, but only at what he does himself, to make it just and holy.”
Author: Marcus Aurelius, Meditations

Motivation: “With our thoughts we make the world.”
Author: Buddha

Motivation: “Scars show us where we have been, they do not dictate where we are going.”
Author: David Rossi

Motivation: “What a wonderful life I’ve had! I only wish I’d realized it sooner.”
Author: Colette

Motivation: “Life might take you down different roads. But each of you gets to decide which one to take.”
Author: Gayle Forman, If I Stay

Motivation: “Dream your own dreams, achieve your own goals. Your journey is your own and unique.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

Motivation: “Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm.”
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Motivation: “Life is ours to be spent, not tobe saved.”
Author: D.H. Lawrence

Motivation: “Too much sanity may be madness — and maddest of all: to see life as it is, and not as it should be!”
Author: Dale Wasserman, Man of La Mancha

Motivation: “And if these mountains had eyes, they would wake to find two strangers in their fences, standing in admiration as a breathing red pours its tinge upon earth's shore. These mountains, which have seen untold sunrises, long to thunder praise but stand reverent, silent so that man's weak praise should be given God's attention.”
Author: Donald Miller, Through Painted Deserts: Light, God, and Beauty on the Open Road

Motivation: “So many people walk around with a meaningless life. They seem half-asleep, even when they're busy doing things they think are important. This is because they're chasing the wrong things. The way you get meaning into your life is to devote yourself to loving others, devote yourself to your community around you, and devote yourself to creating something that gives you purpose and meaning.”
Author: Mitch Albom, Tuesdays with Morrie

Motivation: “Always dream and shoot higher than you know you can do. Do not bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself.”
Author: William Faulkner

Motivation: “We must live together as brothers or perish together as fools.”
Author: Martin Luther King Jr.

Motivation: “After sleeping through a hundred million centuries we have finally opened our eyes on a sumptuous planet, sparkling with color, bountiful with life. Within decades we must close our eyes again. Isn’t it a noble, an enlightened way of spending our brief time in the sun, to work at understanding the universe and how we have come to wake up in it? This is how I answer when I am asked—as I am surprisingly often—why I bother to get up in the mornings.”
Author: Richard Dawkins

Motivation: “Let go of something old that no longer serves you to make room for something new.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

Motivation: “I am seeking, I am striving, I am in it with all my heart.”
Author: Vincent van Gogh

Motivation: “The hardest battle you are ever going to have to fight is the battle to be just you.”
Author: Leo Buscaglia

Motivation: “For those who know the value of and exquisite taste of solitary freedom (for one is only free when alone), the act of leaving is the bravest and most beautiful of all.”
Author: Isabelle Eberhardt, The Nomad: The Diaries of Isabelle Eberhardt

Motivation: “Ever since happiness heard your name, it has been running through the streets trying to find you.”
Author: Hafez

Motivation: “Life before Death.Strength before Weakness.Journey before Destination.”
Author: Brandon Sanderson, The Way of Kings

Motivation: “I heard a definition once: Happiness is health and a short memory! I wish I'd invented it, because it is very true.”
Author: Audrey Hepburn

Motivation: “Forget yesterday - it has already forgotten you. Don't sweat tomorrow - you haven't even met. Instead, open your eyes and your heart to a truly precious gift - today.”
Author: Steve Maraboli, Life, the Truth, and Being Free

Motivation: “Do not yearn to be popular; be exquisite. Do not desire to be famous; be loved. Do not take pride in being expected; be palpable, unmistakable.”
Author: C. JoyBell C.

Motivation: “It takes a huge effort to free yourself from memory”
Author: Paulo Coelho, Aleph

Motivation: “In the beginner’s mind there are many possibilities, but in the expert’s there are few”
Author: Shunryu Suzuki, Zen Mind, Beginner's Mind: Informal Talks on Zen Meditation and Practice

Motivation: “Best not to look back. Best to believe there will be happily ever afters all the way around - and so there may be; who is to say there will not be such endings? Not all boats which sail away into darkness never find the sun again, or the hand of another child; if life teaches anything at all, it teaches that there are so many happy endings that the man who believes there is no God needs his rationality called into serious question..”
Author: Stephen King

Motivation: “It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop.”
Author: Andy Warhol

Motivation: “Feet, what do I need them forIf I have wings to fly.”
Author: Frida Kahlo

Motivation: “You can't go home again”
Author: Thomas Wolfe

Motivation: “It is easy in the world to live after the world's opinion; it is easy in solitude to live after our own; but the great man is he who in the midst of the crowd keeps with perfect sweetness the independence of solitude.”
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson, The Complete Prose Works of Ralph Waldo Emerson

Motivation: “How much you can learn when you fail determines how far you will go into achieving your goals.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

Motivation: “Just because you can doesn't mean you should.”
Author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

Motivation: “It's okay to be a loser, it just depends on how good you are at being one.”
Author: Billie Joe Armstrong

Motivation: “Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.”
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Motivation: “We could never learn to be brave and patient if there were only joy in the world”
Author: Helen Keller

Motivation: “My name is Celaena Sardothien," she whispered, "and I will not be afraid.”
Author: Sarah J. Maas, The Assassin's Blade

Motivation: “There, peeping among the cloud-wrack above a dark tor high up in the mountains, Sam saw a white star twinkle for a while. The beauty of it smote his heart, as he looked up out of the forsaken land, and hope returned to him. For like a shaft, clear and cold, the thought pierced him that in the end the Shadow was only a small and passing thing: there was light and high beauty for ever beyond its reach.”
Author: J.R.R. Tolkien, The Return of the King

Motivation: “We cannot be sure of having something to live for unless we are willing to die for it.”
Author: Che Guevara

Motivation: “Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.”
Author: Thomas A. Edison

Motivation: “Sometimes the most beautiful people are beautifully broken.”
Author: robert m drake

Motivation: “We are all worms, But I do believe that I am a glow worm.”
Author: Winston S. Churchill, Never Give In!: The Best of Winston Churchill's Speeches

Motivation: “You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.”
Author: Zig Ziglar

Motivation: Dream big, start small, but most of all, start.”
Author: Simon Sinek

Motivation: The man who removes a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.”
Author: William Faulkner

Motivation: The critical ingredient is getting off your butt and doing something. It’s as simple as that. A lot of people have ideas, but there are few who decide to do something about them now.”
Author: Nolan Bushnell

Motivation: People may doubt what you say, but they will believe what you do.”
Author: Lewis Cass

Motivation: “I know how it looks. But just start. Nothing is insurmountable.”
Author: Lin-Manuel Miranda

Motivation: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.”
Author: Confucius

Motivation: Be not afraid of growing slowly; be afraid only of standing still.”
Author: Chinese Proverb

Motivation: “Now is the operative word. Everything you put in your way is just a method of putting off the hour when you could actually be doing your dream. You don’t need endless time and perfect conditions. Do it now. Do it today. Do it for twenty minutes and watch your heart start beating.”
Author: — Barbara Sher

Motivation: There is only one proof of ability: action.”
Author: Marie Ebner-Eschenbach

Motivation: “Follow effective action with quiet reflection. From the quiet reflection will come even more effective action.”
Author: James Levin

Motivation: “Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone.”
Author: Pablo Picasso

Motivation: “You are what you do, not what you say you do.”
Author: — Carl Jung

Motivation: Never confuse motion with action.”
Author: Benjamin Franklin

Motivation: “If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you’ll never get it done.”
Author: Bruce Lee

Motivation: “Every day do something that will inch you closer to a better tomorrow.”
Author: Doug Firebaugh

Motivation: “Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.”
Author: Peter Marshall

Motivation: “The most important key to achieving great success is to decide upon your goal and launch, get started, take action, move.”
Author: Brian Tracy

Motivation: “You can’t be that kid standing at the top of the waterslide, overthinking it. You have to go down the chute.”
Author: Tina Fey

Motivation: “Little by little does the trick.”
Author: Aesop

Motivation: “Someday is not a day of the week.”
Author: Janet Dailey

Motivation: “The elevator to success is out of order. You’ll have to use the stairs… one step at a time.”
Author: Joe Girard

Motivation: “Action is a great restorer and builder of confidence. Inaction is not only the result, but the cause, of fear.”
Author: Norman Vincent Peale

Motivation: “I’d rather regret the things I’ve done than regret the things I haven’t done.”
Author: Lucille Ball

Motivation: “The secret of getting things done is to act!”
Author: Dante Alighieri

Motivation: “An idea not coupled with action will never get any bigger than the brain cell it occupied.”
Author: Arnold Henry Glasow

Motivation: “A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.”
Author: Lao Tzu

Motivation: “One hundred percent of the shots you don’t take don’t go in.”
Author: Wayne Gretzky

Motivation: “Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage. If you want to conquer fear, do not sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.”
Author: Dale Carnegie

Motivation: “The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.”
Author: Walt Disney

Motivation: “Take time to deliberate, but when the time for action has arrived, stop thinking and go in.”
Author: Napolean Bonaparte

Motivation: Right now a moment of time is passing by… we must become that moment.”
Author: Paul Cezanne

Motivation: “Nothing happens until something moves.”
Author: Albert Einstein

Motivation: “Don’t try to rush progress. Remember, a step forward, no matter how small, is a step in the right direction. Keep believing.”
Author: Kara Goucher

Motivation: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.”
Author: Wayne Dyer

Motivation: “There are only two rules for being successful. One, figure out exactly what you want to do, and two, do it.”
Author: Mario Cuomo

Motivation: The greatest amount of wasted time is the time not getting started.”
Author: Dawson Trotman

Motivation: “A year from now you will wish you had started today.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: The smallest deed is better than the grandest intention.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: “Be great in act, as you have been in thought.”
Author: Shakespeare

Motivation: Take the first step in faith. You don’t have to see the whole staircase; just take the first step.”
Author: Martin Luther King Jr.

Motivation: “The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.”
Author: Tony Robbins

Motivation: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes but don’t quit.”
Author: Conrad Hilton

Motivation: “Every action you take is a vote for the type of person you wish to become.”
Author: James Clear

Motivation: “Be content to act, and leave the talking to others.”
Author: Baltasar Gracian

Motivation: “It is better to take many small steps in the right direction than to make a great leap forward only to stumble backward.”
Author: Chinese Proverb

Motivation: Some of us are busy doing things; some of us are busy complaining.”
Author: Debasish Mridha

Motivation: Wake up early and tackle the day before it tackles you. Be on offense, not defense.”
Author: Evan Carmichael

Motivation: For any movement to gain momentum, it must start with a small action.”
Author: Adam Braun

Motivation: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.”
Author: Amelia Earhart

Motivation: Act as if everything you do makes a difference. It does.”
Author: William James

Motivation: “Decisions decide destiny. There is no action without decision.”
Author: Tony Robbins

Motivation: “Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: The truth is, unless you let go, unless you forgive yourself, unless you forgive the situation, unless your realize the situation is over, you cannot move forward.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

Motivation: Today I will do what others won't, so tomorrow I can accomplish what others can't.”
Author: Jerry Rice

Motivation: “The secret of getting ahead is getting started. The secret of getting started is breaking your complex, overwhelming tasks into small manageable tasks, and then starting on the first one.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: Try not. Do, or do not. There is no try.”
Author: Yoda

Motivation: The most difficult thing is the decision to act; the rest is merely tenacity.”
Author: Amelia Earhart

Motivation: You never know what's around the corner. It could be everything. Or it could be nothing. You keep putting one foot in front of the other, and then one day you look back and you've climbed a mountain.”
Author: Tom Hiddleston

Motivation: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.”
Author: Sam Levenson

Motivation: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future.”
Author: Bradley Whitford

Motivation: Act the way that you want to feel.”
Author: Gretchen Rubin

Motivation: Even a snail will eventually reach its destination.”
Author: Gail Tsukiyama

Motivation: You cannot plow a field by turning it over in your mind. To begin, begin.”
Author: Gorden B. Hickley

Motivation: “I think a lot of people dream. And while they are busy dreaming, the really happy people, the really successful people, the really interesting, powerful, engaged people? Are busy doing.”
Author: Shonda Rhimes

Motivation: If you have a great ambition, take as big a step as possible in the direction of fulfilling it. The step may only be a tiny one, but trust that it may be the largest one possible for now.”
Author: Mildred McAfee

Motivation: It is easy to sit up and take notice. What is difficult is getting up and taking action.”
Author: Al Batt

Motivation: The only difference between where you are and where you want to be is the steps you haven’t taken yet.”
Author: Hayley Solich

Motivation: “One workout at a time. One day at a time. One meal at a time.”
Author: Chalene Johnson

Motivation: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.
Author: Albert Einstein

Motivation: “The beginning is always today.”
Author: Mary Shelley

Motivation: “Attitude: It is our best friend or our worst enemy.”
Author: John C. Maxwell

Motivation: It is our attitude at the beginning of a difficult task which, more than anything else, will affect its successful outcome.”
Author: William James

Motivation: A healthy attitude is contagious but don’t wait to catch it from others. Be a carrier.”
Author: Tom Stoppard

Motivation: “Everyone faces defeat. It may be a stepping-stone or a stumbling block, depending on the mental attitude with which it is faced.”
Author: Napoleon Hill

Motivation: The optimist sees the donut; the pessimist sees the hole.”
Author: Oscar Wilde

Motivation: A cloudy day is no match for a sunny disposition.”
Author: William Arthur Ward

Motivation: “Attitude is everything, so pick a good one.”
Author: Wayne Dyer

Motivation: “It’s actually cool to be positive and optimistic and idealistic. It’s cool to see yourself doing beautiful, great things.”
Author: Tom DeLonge

Motivation: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.”
Author: Winston Churchill

Motivation: Nothing can stop the man with the right mental attitude from achieving his goal; nothing on earth can help the man with the wrong mental attitude.”
Author: Thomas Jefferson

Motivation: A strong positive attitude will create more miracles than any wonder drug.”
Author: Patricia Neal

Motivation: The last of the human freedoms is to choose one’s attitude in any given set of circumstances.”
Author: Victor Frankl

Motivation: You cannot have a positive life and a negative mind.”
Author: Joyce Meyer

Motivation: You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you, and in that, you will be mastering change rather than allowing it to master you.”
Author: Brian Tracy

Motivation: Whether a glass is half full or half empty depends on the attitude of the person looking at it.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you're going to live your life.”
Author: Joel Osteen

Motivation: Optimism is a happiness magnet. If you stay positive, good things and good people will be drawn to you.”
Author: Mary Lou Retton

Motivation: The world of achievement has always belonged to the optimist.”
Author: J. Harold Wilkins

Motivation: “Your attitude determines your altitude!”
Author: Wayne Dyer

Motivation: Take the attitude of a student… never be too big to ask questions, never know too much to learn something new.”
Author: Maya Angelou

Motivation: Values are related to our emotions; just as we practice physical hygiene to preserve our physical health, we need to observe emotional hygiene to preserve a healthy mind and attitudes.”
Author: Dalai Lama

Motivation: Our attitude towards life determines life’s attitude towards us.”
Author: John Mitchell

Motivation: Having a positive mental attitude is asking how something can be done rather than saying it can’t be done.”
Author: Bo Bennett

Motivation: “If we have the attitude that it’s going to be a great day, it usually is.”
Author: Catherine Pulsifer

Motivation: Ability is what you’re capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.”
Author: Lou Holtz

Motivation: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement; nothing can be done without hope and confidence.”
Author: Helen Keller

Motivation: The greatest revolution of our generation is the discovery that human beings, by changing the inner attitudes of their minds, can change the outer aspects of their lives.”
Author: William James

Motivation: The most important thing you’ll ever wear is your attitude.”
Author: Jeff Moore

Motivation: Our lives are not determined by what happens to us but how we react to what happens, not by what life brings us but the attitude we bring to life.”
Author: Wade Boggs

Motivation: “Optimism is a perfectly legitimate response to failure.”
Author: Stephen King

Motivation: The positive thinker sees the invisible, feels the intangible, and achieves the impossible.”
Author: Winston Churchill

Motivation: Optimism is a choice. Kindness is a choice. Giving is a choice. Respect is a choice. Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Motivation: No pessimist ever discovered the secrets of the stars, or sailed to an uncharted island, or opened a new heaven to the human spirit.”
Author: Helen Keller

Motivation: Perpetual optimism is a force multiplier.”
Author: Colin Powell

Motivation: If you don’t like something, change it. If you can’t change it, change your attitude. Don’t complain.”
Author: Maya Angelou

Motivation: “Sooner or later, the man who wins is the man who thinks he can.”
Author: Vince Lomardi

Motivation: Choose the positive. You have a choice. You are the master of your attitude. Choose the positive, the constructive.”
Author: Bruce Lee

Motivation: Optimist: someone who figures that taking a step backward after taking a step forward is not a disaster; it’s more like a cha-cha.”
Author: Robert Brault

Motivation: Believe and act as if it were impossible to fail.”
Author: Charles F. Kettering

Motivation: Almost every successful person begins with two beliefs: the future can be better than the present, and I have the power to make it so.”
Author: David Brooks

Motivation: As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.”
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Motivation: “It’s not who you think you are that holds you back; it’s who you think you’re not.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: “Keep your eyes on the stars and your feet on the ground.”
Author: Theodore Roosevelt

Motivation: “Let your hopes, not your hurts, shape your future.”
Author: Robert Schuller

Motivation: First thing every morning before you arise, say out loud, ‘I believe’, three times.”
Author: Norman Vincent Peale

Motivation: If I could give one tip for people – it’s not an exercise or nutrition regimen. It’s to walk your talk and believe in yourself, because at the end of the day, the dumbbell and diet don’t get you in shape. It’s your accountability to your word.”
Author: Brett Hoebel

Motivation: Trust because you are willing to accept the risk, not because it’s safe or certain.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: “Northing is impossible; the word itself says ‘I’m possible’!”
Author: Audrey Hepburn

Motivation: Hope fills the holes of my frustration in my heart.”
Author: Emanuel Cleaver

Motivation: Believe while others are doubting.
Author: William Arthur Ward

Motivation: Magic is believing in yourself. If you can make that happen, you can make anything happen.”
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Motivation: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.”
Author: Dale Carnegie

Motivation: As you learn to trust yourself something miraculous happens. You begin to trust the process you are living and the miracles life brings!”
Author: Iyanla Vanzant

Motivation: Believe in yourself. Trust the process. Change forever.”
Author: Bob Harper

Motivation: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.”
Author: Helen Keller

Motivation: Never lose hope. There are always possibilities if you just look for them.”
Author: Catherine Pulsifer

Motivation: “Faith is taking the first step, even when you don’t see the whole staircase.”
Author: Martin Luther King Jr.

Motivation: Close your eyes and imagine the best version of you possible. That’s who you really are. Now, let go of any part of you that doesn’t believe it.”
Author: Chris Assad

Motivation: When you do things the right way, it will take longer; just trust the process!”
Author: Hopal Green

Motivation: Once we believe in ourselves, we can risk curiosity, wonder, spontaneous delight, or any experience that reveals the human spirit.”
Author: E.E. Cummings

Motivation: Hope is a waking dream.”
Author: Aristotle

Motivation: "You can have anything you want if you are willing to give up the belief that you can't have it."
Author: Dr. Robert Anthony

Motivation: It always seems impossible until it’s done.”
Author: Nelson Mandela

Motivation: “Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.”
Author: Norman Vincent Peale

Motivation: Too many people overvalue what they are not and undervalue what they are.”
Author: Malcolm S. Forbes

Motivation: “If you believe it will work out, you will see opportunities. If you believe it won’t, you will see obstacles.”
Author: Wayne Dyer

Motivation: Hope lies in dreams, in imagination, and in the courage of those who dare to make dreams into reality.”
Author: Jonas Salk

Motivation: “There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.”
Author: Bernard Williams

Motivation: Within you right now is the power to do things you never dreamed possible. This power becomes available to you just as soon as you can change your beliefs.”
Author: Dr. Maxwell Maltz

Motivation: Trust in the process as you journey through life in all its emotional highs and lows knowing each moment is sacred and that your soul is safe.”
Author: Anna-Thea

Motivation: Sooner or later, those who win are those who think they can.” ­
Author: Paul Tournier

Motivation: In fact, hope is best gained after defeat and failure, because then inner strength and toughness is produced.”
Author: Fritz Knapp

Motivation: Hope is being able to see that there is light despite all of the darkness.”
Author: Desmond Tutu

Motivation: “Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do."
Author: Benjamin Spock

Motivation: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.”
Author: Theodore Roosevelt

Motivation: “To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream, not only plan, but also believe.”
Author: Anatole France

Motivation: “Trust yourself. You've survived a lot, and you'll survive whatever is coming.”
Author: Robert Tew

Motivation: I don't believe you have to be better than everybody else. I believe you have to be better than you ever thought you could be.”
Author: Ken Venturi

Motivation: I would rather have a mind opened by wonder than closed by belief.”
Author: Gerry Spence

Motivation: We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope
Author: Martin Luther King Jr

Motivation: I learned that you have to push away the demand of people’s expectations by believing in your instincts.”
Author: Stefano Pilati

Motivation: Hope is important because it can make the present moment less difficult to bear. If we believe that tomorrow will be better, we can bear a hardship today.”
Author: Thich Nhat Hanh

Motivation: When someone tells me ‘no’, it doesn’t mean I can’t do it. It simply means I can’t do it with them.”
Author: Karen E. Quinones Miller

Motivation: I know people that believe in ghosts but don’t believe in themselves.”
Author: Mitch Hedberg

Motivation: Create the highest, grandest vision possible for your life, because you become what you believe.”
Author: Oprah Winfrey

Motivation: Whether you think you can or can’t, you’re right.”
Author: Henry Ford

Motivation: “Every negative belief weakens the partnership between mind and body.”
Author: Deepak Chopra

Motivation: Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Motivation: Self trust is the essence of heroism.”
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Motivation: “In any given moment we have two options: to step forward into growth or step back into safety.”
Author: Abraham Maslow

Motivation: People don’t resist change. They resist being changed.”
Author: Peter Senge

Motivation: You will never change your life until you change something you do daily.”
Author: Mike Murdock

Motivation: Move out of your comfort zone. You can only grow if you are willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.”
Author: Brian Tracy

Motivation: It’s not that some people have willpower and some don’t. It’s that some people are ready to change and others are not.”
Author: James Gordon

Motivation: Change is possible, but it must start with self-acceptance.”
Author: Alexander Lowen

Motivation: The key to change… is to let go of fear.”
Author: Rosanne Cash

Motivation: If you don’t like something, change it. If you can’t change it, change your attitude. Don’t complain.”
Author: Maya Angelou

Motivation: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.”
Author: Viktor Frankl

Motivation: If we’re growing, we’re always going to be out of our comfort zone.”
Author: John Maxwell

Motivation: Be bold. Be confident. Be alive. A gallery of possibilities awaits you when you make change your friend.”
Author: Bob Bone

Motivation: Don't go through life, grow through life.
Author: Eric Butterworth

Motivation: Progress is impossible without change.”
Author: Walt Disney

Motivation: You must take personal responsibility. You cannot change the circumstances, the seasons, or the wind, but you can change yourself.”
Author: Jim Rohn

Motivation: The easier it is to do, the harder it is to change.”
Author: Eng’s Principle

Motivation: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.”
Author: Socrates

Motivation: If we don’t change, we don’t grow. If we don’t grow, we aren’t really living.”
Author: Gail Sheehy

Motivation: Be not afraid of growing slowly, be afraid only of standing still.”
Author: Chinese Proverb

Motivation: If you focus on results, you will never change. If you focus on change, you will get results.”
Author: Jack Dixon

Motivation: “Willpower can produce short-term change, but it creates constant internal stress because you haven’t dealt with the root cause.”
Author: Rick Warren

Motivation: There's only one growth strategy: work hard.”
Author: William Hague

Motivation: Be patient with yourself. You are growing stronger every day. The weight of the world will become lighter... and you will begin to shine brighter. Don't give up.”
Author: Robert Tew

Motivation: “Sometimes the winds of change are a hurricane.”
Author: Derek Sivers

Motivation: “Change begins at the end of your comfort zone.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Motivation: When you blame others, you give up your power to change.”
Author: Dr. Robert Anthony

Motivation: Grant me the serenity to accept the things I cannot change, courage to change the things I can, and wisdom to know the difference.”
Author: Modified Serenity Prayer

Motivation: If you always do what you’ve always done, you’ll always get what you’ve always got.”
Author: Henry Ford

Motivation: Our only security is our ability to change.”
Author: John Lilly

Motivation: The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking.”
Author: Albert Einstein

Motivation: Old ways won’t open new doors.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: You cannot expect to achieve new goals or move beyond your present circumstances unless you change.”
Author: Les Brown

Motivation: “Expect change. Analyze the landscape. Take the opportunities. Stop being the chess piece; become the player. It’s your move.”
Author: Tony Robbins

Motivation: If it doesn’t challenge you, it doesn’t change you.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you, and in that, you will be mastering change rather than allowing it to master you.”
Author: Brian Tracy

Motivation: The curious paradox is that when I accept myself just as I am, then I can change.”
Author: Carl Rogers

Motivation: “Change is hard at first, messy in the middle and gorgeous at the end.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: “Habits are the compound interest of self-improvement… the same way that money multiplies through interest.”
Author: James Clear

Motivation: The first step toward change is awareness. The second step is acceptance.”
Author: Nathaniel Branden

Motivation: There is nothing noble about being superior to some other man. The true nobility is in being superior to your previous self.”
Author: Ernest Hemingway

Motivation: We delight in the beauty of the butterfly, but rarely admit the changes it has gone through to achieve that beauty.”
Author: Maya Angelou

Motivation: “Insanity: doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results.”
Author: Albert Einstein

Motivation: “Not everything that is faced can be changed. But nothing can be changed until it is faced.”
Author: James Baldwin

Motivation: Change is never painful; only resistance to change is painful.”
Author: Buddha

Motivation: I think that we have to realize that times of stress are also times that are signals for growth, and if we use adversity properly, we can grow through adversity.”
Author: Abraham J. Twerski

Motivation: “Quite often we change our jobs, friends and spouses instead of changing ourselves.”
Author: Akbarali H. Jetha

Motivation: I don’t think anyone can grow unless he’s loved exactly as he is now, appreciated for what he is rather than what he will be.”
Author: Mister Rogers

Motivation: You cannot change your destination overnight, but you can change your direction overnight.”
Author: Jim Rohn

Motivation: “Life changes fast. Life changes in the instant… the ordinary instant.”
Author: Joan Didion

Motivation: Comfort can be dangerous. Comfort provides a floor but also a ceiling.”
Author: Trevor Noah

Motivation: Change is painful, but nothing is as painful as staying stuck somewhere you don’t belong.”
Author: Mandy Hale

Motivation: Life is an ongoing process of choosing between safety (out of fear and need for defense) and risk (for the sake of progress and growth). Make the growth choice a dozen times a day.”
Author: Abraham Maslow

Motivation: A mind that is stretched by a new experience can never go back to its old dimensions.”
Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

Motivation: Improvement isn’t inevitable. Change is.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: A bird is safe in its nest - but that is not what its wings are made for.”
Author: Amit Ray

Motivation: Sometimes the place you are used to is not the place you belong.”
Author: William Wheeler

Motivation: Life will only change when you become more committed to your dreams than you are to your comfort zone.”
Author: Billy Cox

Motivation: Awareness is the greatest agent for change.”
Author: Eckhart Tolle

Motivation: May your choices reflect your hopes, not your fears.”
Author: Nelson Mandela

Motivation: To change a habit, make a conscious decision, then act out the new behavior.”
Author: Maxwell Maltz

Motivation: Every day brings new choices.”
Author: Martha Beck

Motivation: There are two primary choices in life: to accept conditions as they exist, or accept the responsibility for changing them.”
Author: Denis Waitley

Motivation: If you chase two rabbits, both will escape.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: One day or day one. You decide.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: A goal without a plan is just a wish.”
Author: Larry Elder

Motivation: Habit is habit and not to be flung out of the window by any man, but coaxed downstairs a step at a time.”
Author: Mark Twain

Motivation: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.”
Author: Henry David Thoreau

Motivation: You can’t do it all yourself. Don’t be afraid to rely on others to help you accomplish your goals.”
Author: Oprah Winfrey

Motivation: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.”
Author: C.S. Lewis

Motivation: You will never leave where you are. until you decide where you’d rather be.”
Author: Dexter Yager

Motivation: The most important key to achieving great success is to decide upon your goal and launch, get started, take action, move.”
Author: John Wooden

Motivation: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.”
Author: Jim Rohn

Motivation: Nothing can stop the man with the right mental attitude from achieving his goal; nothing on earth can help the man with the wrong mental attitude.”
Author: Thomas Jefferson

Motivation: The unfortunate thing about this world is that good habits are so much easier to give up than bad ones.”
Author: Somerset Maugham

Motivation: The big secret in life is that there is no secret. Whatever your goal, you can get there if you’re willing to work.”
Author: Oprah Winfrey

Motivation: People with clear, written goals, accomplish far more in a shorter period of time than people without them could ever imagine.”
Author: Brian Tracy

Motivation: “A habit is something you can do without thinking - which is why most of us have so many of them.”
Author: Frank A. Clark

Motivation: Habit is second nature, or rather, ten times nature.”
Author: William James

Motivation: There is no such thing as a self-made man. You will reach your goals only with the help of others.”
Author: George Shinn

Motivation: A dream is just a dream. A goal is a dream with a plan and a deadline.”
Author: Harvey Mackay

Motivation: A dream becomes a goal when action is taken toward its achievement.”
Author: Bo Bennett

Motivation: This one step - choosing a goal and sticking to it - changes everything.”
Author: Scott Reed

Motivation: “Bad habits are like a comfortable bed - easy to get into, but hard to get out of.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: Feeling sorry for yourself, and your present condition is not only a waste of energy but the worst habit you could possibly have.”
Author: Dale Carnegie

Motivation: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.”
Author: Aristotle

Motivation: You must have long-range goals to keep you from being frustrated by short-range failures.”
Author: Charles C. Noble

Motivation: First we form habits; then they form us. Conquer your bad habits or they will conquer you.”
Author: Robert Gilbert

Motivation: A goal properly set is halfway reached.”
Author: Zig Ziglar

Motivation: “Your goals, minus your doubts, equal your reality.”
Author: Ralph Marston

Motivation: If what you are doing is not moving you towards your goals, then it’s moving you away from your goals.”
Author: Brian Tracy

Motivation: If a goal is worth having, it’s worth blocking out the time in your day-to-day life necessary to achieve it.”
Author: Jill Koenig

Motivation: People with goals succeed because they know where they’re going.”
Author: Earl Nightingale

Motivation: You cannot expect to achieve new goals or move beyond your present circumstances unless you change.”
Author: Les Brown

Motivation: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.”
Author: Tony Robbins

Motivation: Give your goals all you’ve got and you’ll be amazed at the energy that comes out of you.”
Author: William James

Motivation: A nail is driven out by another nail. Habit is overcome by habit.”
Author: Erasmus

Motivation: And once you understand that habits can change, you have the freedom and the responsibility to remake them.”
Author: Charles Duhigg

Motivation: You will never change your life until you change something you do daily.”
Author: Mike Murdock

Motivation: Successful people are simply those with successful habits.”
Author: Brian Tracy

Motivation: If you chase two rabbits, both will escape.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: “When I feel tired, I just think about how great I will feel once I finally reach my goal.”
Author: Michael Phelps

Motivation: Don’t be afraid to be ambitious about your goals. Hard work never stops. Neither should your dreams.”
Author: Dwayne Johnson

Motivation: Decide whether or not the goal is worth the risks involved. If it is, stop worrying.”
Author: Amelia Earhart

Motivation: If you don’t separate yourself from your distractions, your distractions will separate you from your goals and the life you want.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: Our health always seems much more valuable after we lose it.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: “By choosing healthy over skinny, you are choosing self-love over self-judgment.”
Author: Steve Maraboli

Motivation: “Being a healthy woman isn’t about getting on a scale or measuring your waistline. We need to start focusing on what matters - on how we feel, and how we feel about ourselves.”
Author: Michelle Obama

Motivation: Life expectancy would grow by leaps and bounds if green vegetables smelled as good as bacon.”
Author: Doug Larson

Motivation: Seek to be whole, not perfect.”
Author: Oprah Winfrey

Motivation: Take care of your body. It’s the only place you have to live.”
Author: Jim Rohn

Motivation: Health is a relationship between you and your body.
Author: Terri Guillemets

Motivation: Learn to relax. Your body is precious, as it houses your mind and spirit. Inner peace begins with a relaxed body.”
Author: Norman Vincent Peale

Motivation: Health is wealth.”
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Motivation: Be healthy and take care of yourself, but be happy with the beautiful things that make you, you.”
Author: Beyonce

Motivation: Your body is a temple, but only if you treat it as one.”
Author: Astrid Alauda

Motivation: Healthy is an outfit that looks different on everybody
Author: Unknown

Motivation: The secret to living well is: eat half, walk double, laugh triple, and love without measure.”
Author: Tibetan proverb

Motivation: I still need more healthy rest in order to work at my best. My health is the main capital I have, and I want to administer it intelligently.”
Author: Ernest Hemingway

Motivation: A man too busy to take care of his health is like a mechanic too busy to take care of his tools.”
Author: Spanish Proverb

Motivation: If we take good care of ourselves, we help everyone.”
Author: Thich Nhat Hanh

Motivation: Health is a state of complete physical, mental and social well-being, and not merely the absence of disease or infirmity.”
Author: World Health Organization

Motivation: Health is like money. We never have a true idea of its value until we lose it.”
Author: Josh Billings

Motivation: You can enjoy life and be healthy at the same time.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: Wellness, I came to realize, will not happen by accident. It must be a daily practice, especially for those of us who are more susceptible to the oppressiveness of the world.”
Author: Jenna Wortham

Motivation: Happiness is the highest form of health.”
Author: Dalai Lama

Motivation: “Procrastination is one of the most common and deadliest of diseases and its toll on success and happiness is heavy.”
Author: Wayne Dyer

Motivation: The most healthy thing is to be true to your own self… but also, that you have a right to express what you see and what you feel and what you think. To be bold. To be as bold with your vision as you can possibly be.”
Author: Alice Walker

Motivation: “It is confidence in our bodies, minds, and spirits that allows us to keep looking for new adventures.”
Author: Oprah Winfrey

Motivation: “Stop trying to fix your body. It was never broken.”
Author: Even Ensler

Motivation: When health is absent, wisdom cannot reveal itself, art cannot become manifest, strength cannot be exerted, wealth is useless, and reason is powerless.”
Author: Herophilus

Motivation: Life is not merely to be alive, but to be well.”
Author: Marcus Valerius Martialis

Motivation: Keeping your body healthy is an expression of gratitude to the whole cosmos - the trees, the clouds, everything.”
Author: Thích Nhat Hanh

Motivation: Small helpings. Sample a little bit of everything. These are the secrets of happiness and good health.”
Author: Julia Child

Motivation: A healthy outside starts from the inside.”
Author: Robert Urich

Motivation: “Every negative belief weakens the partnership between mind and body.”
Author: Deepak Chopra

Motivation: I believe that the greatest gift you can give your family and the world is a healthy you.”
Author: Joyce Meyer

Motivation: The more we see health as a practice rather than as a problem to fix, the more we encourage the body’s natural potential to be healthy.”
Author: Aarti Patel

Motivation: Values are related to our emotions, just as we practice physical hygiene to preserve our physical health, we need to observe emotional hygiene to preserve a healthy mind and attitudes.”
Author: Dalai Lama

Motivation: Your body can stand almost anything. It’s your mind that you have to convince.”
Author: Andrew Murphy

Motivation: “Just because you're not sick doesn't mean you're healthy.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: Living a healthy lifestyle will only deprive you of poor health, lethargy, and fat.”
Author: Jill Johnson

Motivation: Stop spending all day obsessing, cursing, perfecting your body like it’s all you’ve got to offer the world. Your body is not your art, it’s your paintbrush.”
Author: Glennon Doyle

Motivation: A man’s health can be judged by which he takes two at a time – pills or stairs.”
Author: Joan Welsh

Motivation: You know you’ve reached middle age when you’re cautioned to slow down by your doctor, instead of by the police.”
Author: Joan Rivers

Motivation: Today is your opportunity to build the tomorrow you want.”
Author: Ken Poirot

Motivation: Expect change. Analyze the landscape. Take the opportunities. Stop being the chess piece; become the player. It’s your move.”
Author: Tony Robbins

Motivation: Within our dreams and aspirations we find opportunities.”
Author: Sugar Ray Leonard

Motivation: Self-acceptance opens up more possibilities of succeeding because you aren’t fighting yourself along the way.”
Author: Shannon Ables

Motivation: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.”
Author: Milton Berle

Motivation: “A wise man will make more opportunities than he finds.”
Author: Francis Bacon

Motivation: To succeed, jump as quickly at opportunities as you do at conclusions.”
Author: Benjamin Franklin

Motivation: If you believe it will work out, you will see opportunities. If you believe it won’t, you will see obstacles.”
Author: Wayne Dyer

Motivation: A dream is the bearer of a new possibility, the enlarged horizon, the great hope.”
Author: Howard Thurman

Motivation: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.”
Author: Winston Churchill

Motivation: Don’t wait for the right opportunity; create it.”
Author: George Bernard Shaw

Motivation: Every new day begins with possibilities.”
Author: Ronald Reagan

Motivation: Success is where preparation and opportunity meet.”
Author: Bobby Unser

Motivation: Don’t be pushed by your problems; be led by your dreams.”
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Motivation: “Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.”
Author: Thomas Edison

Motivation: The Wright brothers flew right through the smoke screen of impossibility.”
Author: Charles F. Kettering

Motivation: “The path from dreams to success does exist.”
Author: Kalpana Chawla

Motivation: Your big opportunity may be right where you are now.”
Author: Napoleon Hill

Motivation: “We all have possibilities we don't know about. We can do things we don't even dream we can do.”
Author: Dale Carnegie

Motivation: Every experience is an opportunity to learn and grow.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: “I am neither an optimist nor pessimist, but a possibilist.”
Author: Max Lerner

Motivation: “Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.”
Author: Henry Ford

Motivation: Opportunity is everywhere. The key is to develop the vision to see it.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: Victory comes from finding opportunities in problems.”
Author: Sun Tzu

Motivation: The optimist turns the impossible into the possible; the pessimist turns the possible into the impossible.”
Author: William Arthur Ward

Motivation: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.”
Author: Albert Einstein

Motivation: Everything negative – pressure, challenges – is all an opportunity for me to rise.”
Author: Kobe Bryant

Motivation: Do you know what my favorite part of the game is? The opportunity to play.”
Author: Mike Singletary

Motivation: Create the highest, grandest vision possible for your life, because you become what you believe.”
Author: Oprah Winfrey

Motivation: “If your dream isn’t bigger than you, there’s a problem with your dream.”
Author: Deion Sanders

Motivation: I'd rather regret the risks that didn't work out than the chances I didn't take at all.”
Author: Simone Biles

Motivation: “If you think a thing is impossible, you’ll only make it impossible.”
Author: Bruce Lee

Motivation: Each day is a new opportunity. I chose to make this day a great one.
Author: Louise Hay

Motivation: Until you’re ready to look foolish, you’ll never have the possibility of being great.”
Author: Cher

Motivation: The key to realizing a dream is to focus not on success but on significance. Then even the small steps and little victories along your path will take on greater meaning.”
Author: Oprah Winfrey

Motivation: Never lose hope; there are always possibilities if you just look for them.”
Author: Catherine Pulsifer

Motivation: You have to have confidence in your vision or else no one else will trust in it.”
Author: Mary Katrantzou

Motivation: “Everything you can imagine is real.
Author: Pablo Picasso

Motivation: To be happy, drop the words ‘if only’ and substitute instead the words ‘next time’.”
Author: Smiley Blanton

Motivation: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.”
Author: Dalai Lama

Motivation: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.”
Author: Norman Vincent Peale

Motivation: If you want to be happy, do not dwell in the past, do not worry about the future, focus on living fully in the present.”
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Motivation: Success is getting what you want; happiness is wanting what you get.”
Author: W. P. Kinsella

Motivation: Be happy with what you have while working for what you want.”
Author: Helen Keller

Motivation: “It’s never too late - never too late to start over, never too late to be happy.”
Author: Jane Fonda

Motivation: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.”
Author: Helen Keller

Motivation: Be healthy and take care of yourself, but be happy with the beautiful things that make you, you.”
Author: Beyonce

Motivation: “A happy person is not a person in a certain set of circumstances, but rather a person with a certain set of attitudes.”
Author: Hugh Downs

Motivation: Action may not always bring happiness; but there is no happiness without action.”
Author: Benjamin Disraeli

Motivation: “It isn't what you have or who you are or where you are or what you are doing that makes you happy or unhappy. It is what you think about it.”
Author: Dale Carnegie

Motivation: Above all, be true to yourself, and if you cannot put your heart in it, take yourself out of it.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: Gratitude is one of the sweet shortcuts to finding peace of mind and happiness inside. No matter what is going on outside of us, there’s always something we could be grateful for.”
Author: Barry Neil Kaufman

Motivation: Procrastination is one of the most common and deadliest of diseases and its toll on success and happiness is heavy.”
Author: Wayne Dyer

Motivation: “A happy life consists not in the absence, but in the mastery of hardships.”
Author: Helen Keller

Motivation: Because suffering is impermanent, that is why we can transform it. Because happiness is impermanent, that is why we have to nourish it.”
Author: Thich Nhat Hanh

Motivation: The greatest source of happiness is the ability to be grateful at all times.”
Author: Zig Ziglar

Motivation: She began to measure herself in contentment and laughter rather than pounds and inches.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: Any path you choose will likely be full of ups and downs, so choose the ones that bring you the most joy and make you feel most alive.”
Author: Hilary Swank

Motivation: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.”
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Motivation: The reality was my life wasn’t miserable because I was curvy; I was miserable because I thought I’d be happier if I were thinner.”
Author: Brittany Gibbons

Motivation: Life goes by fast. Enjoy it. Calm down. It’s all funny.”
Author: Joan Rivers

Motivation: True happiness is to enjoy the present without anxious dependence on the future.”
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Motivation: You can’t hate yourself happy. You can’t criticize yourself thin. You can’t shame yourself worthy. Real change begins with self-love and self-care.”
Author: Jessica Ortner

Motivation: We all smile in the same language.
Author: Unknown

Motivation: Serenity is knowing that your worst shot is still pretty good.”
Author: Johnny Miller

Motivation: Peace is a journey of a thousand miles and it must be taken one step at a time.”
Author: Lyndon B. Johnson

Motivation: “If others hurt you, let the injury go. This is your test. If you let it go, you will find serenity.”
Author: Wayne Dyer

Motivation: “Learn to relax. Your body is precious, as it houses your mind and spirit. Inner peace begins with a relaxed body.”
Author: Norman Vincent Peale

Motivation: We can never obtain peace in the outer world until we make peace with ourselves.”
Author: Dalai Lama

Motivation: Tension is who you think you should be, relaxation is who you are."
Author: Chinese Proverb

Motivation: It isn’t enough to talk about peace. One must believe in it. And it isn’t enough to believe in it. One must work at it.”
Author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Motivation: Peace begins with a smile.”
Author: Mother Teresa

Motivation: Grant me the serenity to accept the things I cannot change, courage to change the things I can, and wisdom to know the difference.”
“Let go or be dragged.”
Author: Zen Proverb

Motivation: “A stumble may prevent a fall.”
Author: English Proverb

Motivation: A bend in the road is not the end of the road… unless you fail to make the turn.”
Author: Helen Keller

Motivation: It’s not the mistakes in life that are important; it’s what we learn from them.”
Author: Donna Guthrie

Motivation: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.”
Author: Maya Angelou

Motivation: Life is full of obstacle illusions.”
Author: Grant Frazier

Motivation: “If you find a path with no obstacles, it probably doesn’t lead anywhere.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: “You don’t drown by falling in the water. You drown by staying there.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: “Obstacles don’t have to stop you. If you run into a wall, don’t turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it, or work around it.”
Author: Michael Jordan

Motivation: “The way I see it, if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain.”
Author: Dolly Parton

Motivation: The significant problems we face cannot be solved by the same level of thinking that created them.”
Author: Albert Einstein

Motivation: “Sometimes the winds of change are a hurricane.
Author: Derek Sivers

Motivation: “Stand up to your obstacles and do something about them. You will find that they haven’t half the strength you think they have.”
Author: Norman Vincent Peale

Motivation: “Don’t be discouraged. It’s often the last key in the bunch that opens the lock.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: “When defeat comes, accept it as a signal that your plans are not sound. Rebuild those plans, and set sail once more toward your coveted goal.”
Author: Napoleon Hill

Motivation: “You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.”
Author: Margaret Thatcher

Motivation: Obstacles are those frightening things you see when you take your eyes off the goal.”
Author: Henry Ford

Motivation: “Don’t wait until everything is just right. It will never be perfect. There will always be challenges, obstacles and less than perfect conditions. So what. Get started now. With each step you take, you will grow stronger and stronger, more and more skilled, more and more self-confident and more and more successful.”
Author: Mark Victor Hansen

Motivation: “Stumbling is not falling.”
Author: Portuguese Proverb

Motivation: “Negative results are just what I want. They’re just as valuable to me as positive results. I can never find the thing that does the job best until I find the ones that don’t.”
Author: Thomas Edison

Motivation: “Fall seven times, stand up eight.”
Author: Japanese Proverb

Motivation: “Even if you fall on your face, you’re still moving forward.”
Author: Robert C. Gallagher

Motivation: “Sometimes when you’re in a dark place you think you’ve been buried, but you’ve actually been planted.”
Author: Christine Caine

Motivation: “The next best thing to winning is losing! At least you’ve been in the race.”
Author: Nellie Hershey Tullis

Motivation: “The road to success is dotted with many tempting parking places.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: “Our greatest glory consists not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.”
Author: Oliver Goldsmith

Motivation: “I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work.”
Author: Thomas Edison

Motivation: “Everyone faces defeat. It may be a stepping-stone or a stumbling block, depending on the mental attitude with which it is faced.”
Author: Napoleon Hill

Motivation: “Just when the caterpillar thought the world was ending, he turned into a butterfly.”
Author: Proverb

Motivation: “Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.”
Author: Babe Ruth

Motivation: “I have learned that success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles overcome while trying to succeed.”
Author: Booker T. Washington

Motivation: “I am not afraid of storms for I am learning how to sail my ship.”
Author: Louise May Alcott

Motivation: “The difficulties of life are intended to make us better, not bitter.”
Author: Unknown

Motivation: “This too will pass.”
Author: Persian Proverb

Motivation: “Nobody’s going to win all the time. On the highway of life you can’t always be in the fast lane.”
Author: Haruki Murakami

Motivation: “Most people spend more time and energy going around problems than in trying to solve them.”
Author: Henry Ford

Motivation: “If you believe it will work out, you will see opportunities. If you believe it won’t, you will see obstacles.”
Author: Wayne Dyer

Motivation: “The person that tried his best and failed is superior to the person who never tried.”
Author: Bud Wilkinson

Motivation: “Great difficulties may be surmounted by patience and perseverance.”
Author: Abigail Adams

Motivation: “Sometimes, when you fall, you fly.”
Author: Neil Gaiman

Motivation: “You don’t overcome challenges by making them smaller but by making yourself bigger.”
Author: John C. Maxwell

Motivation: “Every cloud has a silver lining.”
Author: John Milson

Motivation: “In three words I can sum up everything I’ve learned about life. It goes on.”
Author: Robert Frost

Motivation: “To be successful you must accept all challenges that come your way. You can’t just accept the ones you like.”
Author: Mike Gafka

Motivation: “You must have long-range goals to keep you from being frustrated by short-range failures.”
Author: Charles C. Noble

Motivation: “In every difficult situation is potential value. Believe this, then begin looking for it.”
Author: Norman Vincent Peale

Motivation: “Still I rise.”
Author: Maya Angelou

Motivation: “The only real failure in life is one not learned from.”
Author: Anthony J. D’Angelo
